channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Giveaways and Contests by RafflePress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Giveaways and Contests by RafflePress

item.title: CVE-2024-6887|2024-09-12T18:30:05.435Z -- unknown -- giveaways%20and%20contests%20by%20rafflepress
item.description: The Giveaways and Contests by RafflePress WordPress plugin before 1.12.16 does not sanitise and escape some of its Giveaways settings, which could allow high privilege users such as editor and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-3963|2024-08-01T20:26:57.225Z -- unknown -- giveaways%20and%20contests%20by%20rafflepress
item.description: The Giveaways and Contests by RafflePress WordPress plugin before 1.12.14 does not sanitise and escape some parameters, which could allow users with a role as low as editor to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.description: The Giveaways and Contests by RafflePress WordPress plugin before 1.12.14 does not sanitise and escape some parameters, which could allow users with a role as low as editor to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.description: The Giveaways and Contests by RafflePress WordPress plugin before 1.12.16 does not sanitise and escape some of its Giveaways settings, which could allow high privilege users such as editor and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
